movies.title: It Was Just an Accident
movies.review: Fantastic performances. I have no doubt I’ll be thinking about this one for a long time to come.

movies.review:
Me: I love time travel movies
Also me: *meme of confused math lady*

movies.title: Sentimental Value
movies.review: I would give this a 3.75 if I could. Enjoyable and tender but didn’t quite *hit*. Colour grading goes hard though.

movies.title: Marty Supreme
movies.review: I guess the revamped ping pong ball venture was an orange herring.

movies.title: Hamnet
movies.review: Had been very excited to see this after reading the book but I sort of think that was my downfall? Was a 5/5 book for me but the movie felt like we were racing from scene to scene and skipping so much of the beautiful story along the way. I don’t feel like we ever really had the chance to sit and soak in any particular part of the storyline. Still enjoyed it, but the book reigns supreme.
